title: Madonna's Sticky & Sweet: Spanish lesson Song Projections Font
content:
I just saw madonna live in nyc and during the song Spanish Lesson they have all the spanish words projected behind her in some cool + really beautiful font. i unfortunately have no image of it, was wondering if anyone has seen it and can tell me which font it is?

 [‹ Modern Style - please help to ID](http://web.archive.org/web/20081010133631/http:/typophile.com/node/50377 "Go to previous forum topic") [A bold font, what can it be? - image attached. ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081010133631/http:/typophile.com/node/50372 "Go to next forum topic")
author: rgracia

comments.content:
Here’s an image I got partially from a you tube video.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081010133631im_/http:/typophile.com/files/sticky-sweet_4848.jpg)
I guess these might be hand written and then animated...
